original_text: and you yourself will have a severe sickness with a disease of your bowels, until your bowels come out because of the disease, day by day.’”
korean_text: 또 너는 창자에 중병이 들고 그 병이 날로 중하여 창자가 빠져나오리라 하셨다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: and you yourself will have a severe sickness
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너 자신은 심각한 병에 걸릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: with a disease of your bowels
